question: Which state government has launched a mobile app 'People First' for citizens?
explanation: N. Chandrababu Naidu, the Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister, has launched \'People First\' mobile application at the Collectors\' conference in Vijayawada. The app will empower citizens with real-time governance. It will keep the citizens updated with the latest schemes and services of the government and the users will also be able to use the app for registering their complaints. The registered complaints will be addressed as soon as possible and selected complaints will be directly monitored by the chief minister himself.
